listitem.simpara: All debian/changelog files have been updated to the machine-readable DEP-5 format. The copyright of all packages has been extended to 2019 (28499):
Always set UCR variable update/reboot/required when a new kernel is installed (48349).
Implement new &ucsUDN; Protocol Version 3, which does not transmit Distinguished Names over an unencrypted and unauthenticated channel (48427).
The new script univention-replicate-many can be used to re-replicate multiple objects at once (41262).
The recommended browser versions have been updated (47829).
The Univention logo has been updated (48700).
The feature of modern browsers to automatically fill out HTML form fields has been improved (46198).
The design of the web interface has been improved (48471, 48723).

The portal now has its own service. univention-portal-server filters entries that shall only be seen by users of certain groups in the backend, instead of serving all and the frontend hides them. Permissions on nested groups are now evaluated correctly (48358, 48595).
The portal can now be customized via a custom CSS file (48506).

The user guidance in the portal has been improved. It is now possible to define whether users have to be logged in to visit the portal. Furthermore a custom message can be configured to show to users that are not logged in and would be presented with an empty portal otherwise (48546).
The portal now depends on netcat-openbsd to ensure that it's join script is IPv6 compatible (46556).
The errors from pam_cracklib are evaluated again when changing the password via &ucsUMC; (48684).
The UMC module obtained a graphical overhaul and new filters (48449, 48483, 48846).
It is now possible to show a preview of certain Apps that are not (yet) installable. These Apps can be voted for to get more insights whether users would want this App in the App Center (48472).

The App Center is now able to handle Apps with install permissions. This describes App versions that can only be installed when the App has been bought from the Univention App Center store (48624, 48544, 48127, 48753).
There are two new UCS apps, the Admin Diary Frontend and the Admin Diary Backend (48675, 48341, 48717, 48342, 48343, 48476).

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: A singular and plural object name have been added for every module (48738).

section.title: Modules for system settings / setup wizard

listitem.simpara: Make the software components for UCS available during installation when it is run in French (44162).
Having multiple (virtual) network interfaces with the same MAC address caused the domain join to fail (48475).
Copy cn=translog database for transaction log to &ucsBackup; while joining (48427).
A new tab Apps has been added to users, which allows to enable and disable apps (48621, 48839).
The wizard for creating new users now allows to use an e-mail invitation for that user instead of setting an initial password (Requires the App Self Service) (48660).
Use new &ucsUDN; Protocol Version 3 for check (48427).
Fixed error in Check well known SIDs system diagnostic test (48477).
Added command line tool univention-run-diagnostic-checks which can be used to execute the diagnostic checks (47650).
A typo has been fixed in the error output of the Kerberos DDNS update check (48385).
The proxy server test has been fixed (48385).
Quotas on XFS file systems are shown again on the &ucsUMC; (48315).
A crash in the &ucsUMS; module is prevented if widget definitions are configured via &ucsUCRV;s (48494).
Support activation of the cn=monitor backend for statistical information. To activate this, set &ucsUCRV; ldap/monitor to true and restart the LDAP server service (slapd) (41213).
Add cn=translog database for transaction log (48427).
During the update, a resynchronization of the listener module ldap_extension is performed on &ucsBackup; and &ucsSlave; systems to correct possible inconsistencies in LDAP ACLs (48530).
Enabled cn=config backend, accessible via ldapi:/// only (43515).
Add univention-lib implementation of die() function to ldap.sh (47424).

Due to a logic error it could happen that not all LDAP ACL registered in LDAP were active on newly installed &ucsMaster; systems. This could lead to information disclosure or replication errors. The error is now fixed and when updating the univention-ldap-server package, missing LDAP ACLs are automatically activated (48530).
Do not send cron mails for a successful ldap-backup cron job (48014).
The syntax class mailinglist_name was integrated into syntax.py (48383).
The repository tools univention-repository-addpackage, univention-repository-delpackage and univention-repository-merge are deprecated and are removed with UCS-4.4 (29505).
The packages index files under dists/ are now also mirrored. This is required for the PXE network installer (46600).
Added the &ucsUCRV; update/debug/level for changing the debug level of the UCS updater (47913).
The error message complaining about the missing postmirror.sh file is no longer displayed (27761).
When mirroring distributions the default architecture was not detected correctly and URLs were scheduled for download multiple times (48424).
The updater scripts preup.sh and postup.sh have been adapted to the needs of UCS 4.4 (48808).
The updater has been fixed to work with a local repository only initialized by univention-repository-create from DVD (48910).
univention-repository-create now checks if univention-debmirror is installed before installing it (48151).
The univention-saml Apache VirtualHost configuration can now be extended by placing .conf files in the directory /etc/apache2/sso-vhost.conf.d/ (48348).
If the self service is installed, a daemon on the &ucsMaster; now sends an invitation email to users that were created with respective settings in the UMC (48446).
It is now possible to define attributes a self service user can modify with the &ucsUCRV;s self-service/ldap_attributes and self-service/udm_attributes (48447, 48710)
Allow switching to None, smb (raw) printer model (47843).
Ensure /usr/share/cups/model is a link to /usr/share/ppd/ (47435).
Fixed a local root exploit in the SUID wrapper for the Nagios check univention_ldap (48616).
Fixed an uncaught type error in the nagios-server listener (43426).

Network access servers for example wireless access points can now be configured with &ucsUDM;. Any existing clients.conf is not converted and can still be used to configure clients manually (25935). Switch to Python passlib for DES encryption (48460). Move clients.conf.example into the right folder (46561). Improved logging for univention-radius-ntlm-auth which is used by FreeRADIUS to authenticate users. Log entries are written to radius_ntlm_auth.log. The log level can be adjusted with the &ucsUCRV; freeradius/auth/helper/ntlm/debug. Internal changes to enable the &ucsUAS; RADIUS implementation to build upon the univention-radius package (46018).
Normalize CPU utilization of host and update error and migration status atomically (48340).
Show CPU usage in tree of virtualization hosts (35196).
Fix tooltips preventing button clicks (45498).
Add Hyper-V Enlightment for Windows VMs (48024).
The target hosts for live migration can now be configured even when the virtual machine is running (48199).
Fix parsing memory and disk capacity (36661).
Fix file permissions of backup directory (47741).
Add support for post-copy migration (47617).
Small layout adjustments for the updated UMC design (48859, 46198, 48471)
Add RAM overcommitment protection through &ucsUCRV; uvmm/overcommit/reserved (48901).
The samba-tool ntacl sysvolcheck didn't map owner LA to DA properly while checking, leading to irritating, unnecessary error messages (44282).
The package samba has be updated to version 4.10.0~rc2 (48084).
Accounts for service principals are now created with UDM (47955).
Activation of &ucsUAS; specific LDB modules has been moved from 97libunivention-ldb-modules.inst to 96univention-samba4.inst to simplify package structure (47955).
Moving objects in UCS with a LDAP base different in UCS and Samba has been fixed (48362).
Password synchronization has been adjusted to Samba 4.10 (48142).
The package univention-errata-level has been updated to reset the &ucsUCRV; version/erratalevel to 0 (48654).
For security reasons all join scripts now use a password file (46969).
Hooks have been added to the join process (47940, 48801).

The join status file is now reset a second time right after the join hooks of type join/pre-joinscripts have been called. This prevents join problems on &ucsBackup; system in case the join hook installed additional software (48751).
